title: Une Semaine de bonte, ou, Les sept elements capitaux
creator_credit: Jean Desvilles and Les Productions Tanit
brief_description: Pictures the work of Max Ernst in which he uses Victorian engravings to animate a Gothic tale of a world where only the inconceivable represents the norm. Narrated in English.
